message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1500000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1200000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
